function_call.name: classify_risks_framework
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Lack of clarity in defining speed of recovery and performance levels","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Failure to account for environmental and human factors in resilience calculations","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Unclear relationship between absorptive capacity and adaptive capacity","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Difficulty comprehending extreme values of the metric","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Exponential growth function may not always represent system behavior","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Dependence on decision maker preferences for resilience values","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Probabilistic approach for assessing resilience","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Quality of service as a measure of resilience","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Uncertainty in quantification of resilience","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Failure to consider extra penalty for performance loss and recovery time exceeding maximum acceptable values","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Incorporation of multiple hazards into the resilience measurement approach","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Mischaracterization of restoration and resilience due to errors in estimating conditional probability by expert knowledge","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Resilience formula considers both pre-disaster and post-disaster activities, leading to a more suitable measurement for engineering systems","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Difficulty in calculating conditional probability, especially when a disruption occurs for the first time","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"The text discusses the implications of aging on system performance and resilience, which may be relevant in the context of contagious diseases that affect different age groups differently","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"The resilience metric described in the text may not directly address the specific challenges posed by contagious diseases and their propagation in the built environment","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"The text mentions the inclusion of contingency strategies in the resilience metric, which may not fully account for the rapid and evolving nature of contagious disease outbreaks","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Stochastic nature of pd","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Dependence on dynamic simulation model for time-dependent extension","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Applicability of the resilience metric to different infrastructures","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of effective recovery activities defined","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Reliance on imprecise probabilities for quantifying resilience","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate identification of primary contributors to network resilience","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Modeling vulnerability and recoverability in a network","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Structural-based models for system resilience","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of pre-event mitigation strategies for road networks","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inefficiency in petrochemical plant departments","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate public transportation network resilience","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Failure to account for cascading impact of disruptive events through waterway network","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Uncertainty in disruption occurrence and resilience network design","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Failure to consider the impact of multiple component disruptions on rail network resilience","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of consideration for preparedness actions in resilience models","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Cascading failures in complex networks","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Neglect of recovery dimension in resilience models","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Lack of resource allocation patterns for business continuity and disaster recovery plans","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Vulnerability of supply chain components to disruptions","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of preparedness for terrorist attacks and mass decontamination","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate assessment of supply chain resilience and preparedness for carlo simulation for studying reservoir resilience","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Time-dependent simulation model for measuring resilience indicators of railway standards ensuring resilience","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"}]}
